description: In your Movement phase, the Ethereal may invoke one of the elemental powers. All T'AU EMPIRE INFANTRY and BATTLESUIT units within 6" of any ETHEREAL invoking an elemental power gains the relevant benefit until the start of your next turn.
* Calm of Tides: Subtract 1 from any Morale tests made for affected units.
* Storm of Fire: You may re-roll hit rolls of 1 in the Shooting phase for affected units that remain stationary in the Movement phase.
* Sense of Stone: Whenever an affected unit suffers an unsaved wound, roll a D6. On a 6, that wound is ignored.
* Zephyr's Grace: You can re-roll the dice for affected units when they Advance.
rules.name: Invocation of the Elements
